workspaces.noWorkspaces.note: You can run your jobs as soon as you have a workspace.
workspaces.create.notice: Create a workspace to keep your workloads together.
workspaces.labels.name: Name
workspaces.placeholders.name: A unique name for your workspace
workspaces.placeholders.description: Add a brief desription to your workspace
workspaces.members.updateNotice: You can update the role of the member in the workspace.
workspaces.invitations.noInvitations.not: You can continue working with your current workspaces or create a new one!
workspaces.invitations.updateNotice: You can update the role of the membership invitation.
workspaces.invitations.createNotice: You can invite another user to this workspace by their email.
workspaces.invitations.createError: Could not invite the user to the workspace.
workspaces.invitations.decline.notice: You are about to decline the invitation. The operation cannot be undone.
workspaces.invitations.accept.notice: Once accepted, you will be added to the workspace.
workspaces.clusters.page.title: Workspace Clusters
workspaces.clusters.noWorkspaces.note: You need to have at least one cluster in your workspace to run jobs.
workspaces.clusters.create.notice: Create a cluster to run your jobs over.
workspaces.clusters.messages.testFailed: The cluster configuration is not valid or no enough permissions.
workspaces.clusters.messages.testSuccess: Successfully connected to the cluster. {nodesCount} nodes are explored.
workspaces.clusters.placeholders.name: A unique name for your cluster
workspaces.clusters.placeholders.descrip: Add a brief desription to your cluster
workspaces.clusters.placeholders.configu: Add configuration for your cluster (example: kubeconfig for your K8s cluster)
